snippet: The detainee died, and nine others were injured, in a stampede during a riot at a Saudi detention center for migrant workers awaiting deportation, the police said Monday.
abstract: Detainee dies in a stampede during a riot at a Saudi detention center for migrant workers awaiting deportation; nine others are injured.
lead_paragraph: The detainee died, and nine others were injured, in a stampede during a riot at a Saudi detention center for migrant workers awaiting deportation, the police said Monday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Migrant Dies in Deportation Center Riot
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Migrant Dies in Deportation Center Riot
